body_html: @mrry and @rohan100jain, if limited access to a Windows environment prevents you from investigating this, I could set up a low-performance Azure VM with my monthly personal MSDN credits. (Couldn't run it all month, but certainly long enough for you to have a look.) You can reach me at mawah at microsoft if interested.

(Couldn't run it all month, but certainly long enough for you to have a look.) You can reach me at mawah at microsoft if interested.
